patthana15.28:1.1: Anidassanaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassano nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Akusalaṃ kusalasadisaṃ.)
patthana15.28:2.1: Anidassanaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassano naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.28:3.1: Appaṭighaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.28:4.1: Appaṭighaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naappaṭigho naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.28:5.1: Abyākate paccayavasena ekaṃ. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
